title: Regularization Geometry Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization showing how L1 and L2 regularization constrain model weights geometrically, demonstrating why L1 regularization produces sparse solutions while L2 produces smooth shrinkage.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Machine Learning
Regularization
Optimization

learningObjectives: Understand how L1 and L2 regularization constrain weights geometrically
Explain why L1 regularization produces sparse solutions
Compare the behavior of L1 (Lasso) and L2 (Ridge) regularization
Visualize the regularization path as constraint strength varies
Connect constraint regions to feature selection in machine learning

controls.name: L1 (Lasso)
controls.description: Switches to L1 regularization with diamond constraint

controls.name: L2 (Ridge)
controls.description: Switches to L2 regularization with circular constraint

controls.name: Show Regularization Path
controls.description: Displays the path of solutions as alpha varies from 0 to maximum

controls.name: Animate
controls.description: Animates the regularized solution as alpha increases

controls.name: OLS Solution Point
controls.description: Drag to change the unconstrained OLS solution location

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of regularization geometry visualizer
Explore regularization geometry visualizer through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of regularization geometry visualizer to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on regularization geometry visualizer
